item.title: 宝马首席执行官称欧洲必须取消汽油发动机禁令以减少对中国的依赖
item.description: 宝马公司首席执行官周二表示，欧洲必须取消从2035年起禁止新的化石燃料排放汽车的计划，以减少对中国电池供应链的依赖，并发挥其技术优势。【原文：Europe must cancel its plan to ban new fossil fuel-emitting cars from 2035 to reduce reliance on China's battery supply chain and play to its technological strengths, BMW's chief executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马斯克对安巴尼的游说做出反应，称印度拍卖卫星频谱的任何举动都是 "史无前例 "的
item.description: 路透社报道称，竞争对手亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）正在游说印度采用拍卖方式，星链公司老板埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对此回应说，印度拍卖卫星宽带频谱而不是分配频谱的做法将是 "史无前例的"。【原文：Starlink boss Elon Musk said a move by India to auction satellite broadband spectrum, and not allocate it, would be "unprecedented", reacting to a Reuters story that rival billionaire Mukesh Ambani was lobbying for the auction route.】

item.title: 中国经济 2024 年将增长 4.8%，未达目标：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，中国经济在2024年可能增长4.8%，低于政府的目标，2025年增长可能进一步降至4.5%，这将使决策者在考虑采取更多刺激措施时继续承受压力。【原文：China's economy is likely to expand 4.8% in 2024, undershooting the government's target, and growth could cool further to 4.5% in 2025, a Reuters poll showed, maintaining the pressure on policymakers as they consider more stimulus measures.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 将于 11 月在七个亚洲市场推出 Max 流媒体服务
item.description: 媒体巨头华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周二表示，将于 11 月 19 日在亚洲 7 个市场推出 Max 流媒体服务，从而使该平台在超过 72 个市场可用。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery will launch its Max streaming service across seven Asian markets on Nov. 19, making the platform available in more than 72 markets, the media giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球投资者的乐观情绪出现自 2020 年 6 月以来的最大涨幅 - 美国银行
item.description: 美国银行周二公布的一项对基金经理的调查显示，由于美联储降息、对中国刺激政策的预期以及美国经济软着陆，10月份全球投资者的乐观情绪创下了2020年6月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Global investor optimism scored the biggest jump since June 2020 in October due to Federal Reserve rate cuts, expectations of stimulus from China and of a soft landing for the U.S. economy, a BofA survey of fund mangers published on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: LG 能源解决方案与福特汽车签署两项电池供应协议
item.description: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 公司周二表示，该公司已签署了两份向欧洲福特汽车公司供应电动汽车电池的合同，但未透露交易金额。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution said on Tuesday that it has signed two contracts to supply electric vehicle batteries to the Ford Motor company in Europe, without disclosing the value of the deals.】

item.title: 爱立信业绩超预期，市场出现企稳迹象
item.description: 瑞典爱立信公司周二称，受北美 5G 设备需求反弹的帮助，该公司核心盈利和销售额均超出预期，电信设备市场正显示出好转迹象。【原文：Sweden's Ericsson on Tuesday said the telecom equipment market is showing signs of improvement after reporting core earnings and sales above expectations, helped by a rebound in demand for 5G gear in North America.】

item.title: 经济楔形缺口扩大，欧美债券迅速分化
item.description: 欧元区和美国政府债券市场之间的迅速分化预计将继续下去，因为欧洲经济日益乏力，加大了欧洲央行迅速降息的压力。【原文：A rapid divergence between euro zone and U.S. government bond markets is expected to continue, as an increasingly lacklustre European economy adds to the pressure on the European Central Bank to quickly cut interest rates.】

item.title: 独家报道花旗监管困境的关键：员工需要技能 "提升
item.description: 根据花旗集团自己的评估，该公司一直在努力对员工进行风险、合规和数据方面的充分培训，这也揭示了为什么花旗集团花费数十亿美元进行全面改革，却需要数年时间来解决监管问题。【原文：Citigroup has struggled to adequately train employees in risk, compliance and data roles, according to the bank's own assessment, shedding light on why it is taking it years to fix regulatory issues even as billions are spent on an overhaul.】

item.title: 7-Eleven 的扭亏计划需要重拳出击才能阻止 Couche-Tard 470 亿美元的收购计划
item.description: 日本的 Seven & i 控股公司（Seven & i Holdings）正押注于通过剥离表现不佳的业务和专注于主力店 7-Eleven 来提升价值。该战略的结果将决定它能否成功应对加拿大 470 亿美元的收购要约。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings is betting it can boost value by hiving off underperforming businesses and focusing on mainstay 7-Eleven stores. The outcome of its strategy will determine whether it can outmanoeuvre a $47 billion Canadian takeover bid.】

item.title: 欧洲 英伟达（Nvidia）向苹果发起新一轮冲击
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称全球公共债务将突破 100 万亿美元，经济增长可能加速
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，今年全球公共债务总额将首次超过100万亿美元，而且增长速度可能比预测的更快，因为政治情绪倾向于增加支出，而缓慢的经济增长放大了借贷需求和成本。【原文：The world's total public debt is set to exceed $100 trillion this year for the first time, and may grow more quickly than forecast as political sentiment favors higher spending and slow growth amplifies borrowing needs and costs, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称中国可能在三年内筹集 8500 亿美元新债以刺激经济增长
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，中国可能在三年内从特别国债中额外筹集 6 万亿元人民币（合 8,500 亿美元），以刺激下行的经济。【原文：China may raise an additional 6 trillion yuan ($850 billion) from special treasury bonds over three years to stimulate a sagging economy, local media reported, a figure that failed to revive sentiment in the country's stock market.】

item.title: 多数亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，原油跌幅扩大
item.description: 受华尔街强劲收盘和投资者对企业盈利乐观情绪的支撑，周二亚洲股市大多走高，而美元则维持在两个月最高点附近，这得益于对美国下月降息幅度较小的押注。【原文：Asian stocks were mostly higher on Tuesday, supported by a strong Wall Street close and investor optimism about corporate earnings, while the dollar held near a two-month top, aided by bets on a smaller U.S. rate cut next month.】

item.title: 世界银行：太平洋地区增长放缓，大流行病后反弹势头减弱
item.description: 世界银行（World Bank）周二表示，随着大流行病后的反弹逐渐消退，以及占该地区一半产出的斐济经济增长大幅放缓，预计今年整个太平洋岛屿的经济增长将从2023年的5.8%放缓至3.6%。【原文：Growth across the Pacific Islands is expected to slow to 3.6% this year, down from 5.8% in 2023, as a post-pandemic rebound fades and Fiji, contributing half of the region's output, slowed significantly, the World Bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国考虑限制向部分国家出口英伟达人工智能芯片
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，美国官员已经讨论过在特定国家限制英伟达和其他美国公司销售先进的人工智能芯片。【原文：U.S. officials have discussed limiting sales of advanced AI chips from Nvidia and other American companies on a country-specific basis, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元创逾两个月新高，日元接近 150/dlr
item.description: 周二，受美联储将在短期内适度降息的赌注刺激，美元兑主要货币的汇率创下两个多月来的新高，而日元则逼近每美元 150 美元的关键水平。【原文：The U.S. dollar was perched at an over two-month high against major currencies on Tuesday, spurred by wagers the Federal Reserve will proceed with modest rate cuts in the near term, while the yen inched closer to the key 150 per dollar level.】

item.title: 油价因需求担忧和以色列言论下跌 2 美元
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价下跌2美元，原因是欧佩克下调了2024年和2025年全球石油需求增长前景，而且有媒体报道称以色列愿意打击伊朗的军事目标，而不是核或石油目标。【原文：Oil prices slid $2 in early Asian trade on Tuesday as OPEC lowered its outlook for global oil demand growth in 2024 and 2025 and a media report that Israel is willing to strike Iranian military and not nuclear or oil targets.】

item.title: 中国开发商远洋集团预计将产生 28 亿美元现金用于偿还海外债务
item.description: 中国房地产开发商远洋集团周二表示，其重组计划正在有条不紊地实施，预计未来十年将产生28亿美元现金，用于偿还新的融资工具。【原文：Chinese property developer Sino-Ocean Group said on Tuesday its restructuring plan was being implemented in an orderly manner and it expects to generate $2.8 billion in cash over the next decade to repay its new financing instruments.】

item.title: 消息人士称，东京地铁首次公开募股价格为 1,200 日元/辆
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，东京地铁公司已将首次公开发行股票的定价定为每股 1,200 日元，处于 1,100 至 1,200 日元区间的上限。【原文：Tokyo Metro has priced its initial public offering at 1,200 yen a share, at the top end of 1,100 to 1,200 yen range, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 央行代表在金银会议上表示，央行仍是黄金的热衷买家
item.description: 三家央行的代表周一在迈阿密举行的伦敦金银市场协会年会上表示，出于金融或战略原因，各国央行仍热衷于购买黄金，以实现储备多样化。【原文：Central banks remain keen buyers of gold to diversify their reserves for financial or strategic reasons, representatives of three central banks told the London Bullion Market Association's annual conference in Miami on Monday.】

item.title: 中国大放异彩，欧洲复苏，9 月全球电动汽车销量增长 30.5
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周二表示，9 月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的销量年增 30.5%，中国的销量超过了 8 月份创下的纪录，欧洲也恢复了增长。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose by an annual 30.5% in September, as China surpassed its record numbers recorded in August and Europe resumed growth, market research firm Rho Motion said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称 Verizon 收购 Frontier 面临投资者质疑
item.description: 三位熟悉 Frontier Communications 计划的消息人士称，Frontier Communications 的一些最大股东对 Verizon Communications 计划以 96 亿美元收购该公司表示担忧，其第二大投资者计划投票反对该交易。【原文：Some of Frontier Communications' largest shareholders are concerned about its planned $9.6 billion takeover by Verizon Communications , with its second-largest investor planning to vote against the deal, three sources sources familiar with the firm's plans said.】

item.title: 早间竞价东京重开，标准普尔500指数创新高，人民币下跌
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 工会和消息人士称波音下月将向数千人发出裁员通知
item.description: 一位工程工会发言人和一位业内消息人士周一称，波音公司将于 11 月中旬向被裁员的员工发出为期 60 天的通知，这是该公司上周宣布的削减 17000 个工作岗位计划的一部分。【原文：Boeing will send 60-day notices in mid-November to staff being made redundant as part of a plan announced last week to cut 17,000 jobs at the debt-laden planemaker, an engineering union spokesperson and one industry source said on Monday.】

item.title: CoverGirl 母公司 Coty 预计第一季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 由于美国经济放缓，CoverGirl 的母公司科蒂公司周一预计第一季度的同类销售增长低于此前的预期，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌了 4%。【原文：CoverGirl parent Coty on Monday estimated first-quarter like-for-like sales growth below its prior forecast due to a slowdown in the U.S., sending its shares down 4% in after-market trading.】

item.title: 花旗称中东潜在供应中断可能使石油价格突破 100 美元/桶
item.description: 花旗研究公司（Citi Research）周一上调了对本季度和下一季度油价的看涨预期，称由于中东冲突加剧，在这几个月中市场担心或实现供应损失的可能性增大。【原文：Citi Research on Monday raised its bull case scenario for oil prices for this quarter and the next one, citing heightened potential of the market to fear or realize supply losses during these months due to growing Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 飞利浦 66 通过出售瑞士合资企业股权实现 30 亿美元的资产剥离目标
item.description: 美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 周一表示，将以 12.4 亿美元的价格向其瑞士合资伙伴出售其在 Coop Mineraloel AG 公司的 49% 非经营性股权。【原文：Phillips 66 will sell its 49% non-operated equity interest in Coop Mineraloel AG to its Swiss joint venture partner for $1.24 billion, the U.S. refiner said on Monday.】

item.title: 微软 GenAI 研究副总裁加入 OpenAI
item.description: 微软周一表示，其 GenAI 研究副总裁塞巴斯蒂安-布贝克（Sebastien Bubeck）将离开公司，加入 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI。【原文：Microsoft on Monday said that its vice president of GenAI research, Sebastien Bubeck, is leaving the company to join ChatGPT-maker OpenAI.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔（Sabadell）主席称，银行交易可能使银行规模过大并损害消费者利益
item.description: 西班牙萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）主席何塞普-奥柳（Josep Oliu）周一表示，银行业合并并不总是创造股东价值的最佳方式，而且可能导致寡头垄断，对客户不利。【原文：Banking consolidation is not always the best way to create shareholder value and can lead to oligopolies that are bad for clients, Chair of Spain's Sabadell Josep Oliu said on Monday.】
